rules_text:
Flying, Haste
Whenever this creature attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}. This mana doesn’t empty as steps and phases change, and can only be used on casting instant or sorcery spells.

OG_1:
Flying, Haste
As long as this creature is attacking, spells you cast cost 3 less to cast.
